questions.question: Explore the data by first isolating the top-performing museums, then adjust the time granularity to uncover hidden periodic patterns.

answer.value:
Focusing on the top three museums reveals a clear quarterly cycle previously masked by lower-volume lines. 
The main Museum line leads other institutions by 2-3 weeks in trend direction changes, suggesting it functions as a market bellwether.
A bi-annual pattern emerges specifically at America Tropical, likely tied to their exhibition rotation schedule every six months.

key_insights: The main Museum line leads other institutions by 2-3 weeks in trend direction changes, suggesting it functions as a market bellwether
The quarterly pattern suggests budgetary or curatorial planning cycles.

reasoning.reasoning: Temporal granularity adjustment shifts analytical scale to reveal programming-driven cycles invisible in annual views.
